segments.text: Would you like to come to our party ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to . But I'm not myself today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: what happened ? You look so pale .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's the end of the world for me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Today , I'm told I failed three courses .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's too bad . Work harder next term .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm such a fool that duplication of effort is only a waste of time to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't loose heart . Everything will be fine .
segments.speaker: S1
